title: Lesson 6
paragraph: Knowledge and intelligence enable insight and understanding. Awareness, reasoning, and erudition allow individuals to make informed decisions and solve complex problems.

words.example: Her insight helped solve the problem.

words.meaning: the ability to think and understand

words.example: She showed business acumen in negotiations.

words.meaning: the ability to see or understand
words.example: His perception of the situation was accurate.

words.meaning: the mental process of acquiring knowledge

words.example: His reasoning was clear and precise.
Discernment is vital in decision making.

words.meaning: knowledge of a situation or fact
words.example: Awareness of cultural differences is important.
Her comprehension of the text was excellent.
